# Speeti - Lebensmittel Lieferservice MÃ¼nster
# https://speeti.de

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://speeti.de/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1

# Block admin and API routes
Disallow: /admin
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /driver
Disallow: /warehouse

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /category/
Allow: /search
Allow: /login
Allow: /support
